cont.entity_a: The pads on the bottom are hard plastic, preventing tearing and enhancing sliding. The cord is nylon-wrapped, preventing twisting and breaking.
Offers the equivalent of 10 programmable buttons for gaming. Programmable buttons are easy to use and well-placed. Lacks additional buttons for gaming.
cont.entity_b: Multi-function buttons are convenient but optional. Customizable buttons with provided software. Software allows button reprogramming.

cont.entity_a: Wired design preferred for gaming. Cord could be longer.
cont.entity_b: Cordless design simplifies desktop setup. Cordless feature appreciated by multiple users.

cont.entity_a: Weight discs add a nice heaviness, and it does not glow in the dark. Weights improve precision for gaming. Weight customization is impressive but not essential. Adjustable weights enhance user comfort.
Adjustable dpi setting is a favorite feature. Extremely responsive with a 2000dpi engine. High precision and unique DPI changing feature. High precision, perfect for vector drawing apps.
The laser tracks well, providing incredible speed and accuracy. Works well on various surfaces, ideal for Photoshop. Great for high-resolution screens.
cont.entity_b: Accurate laser movement tracking. Precise movement for games and graphics.

cont.entity_a: Comfortable and accurate for long-term use. Some users find the mouse size awkward.
Logitech is a sturdy and reliable brand.
Tough build, difficult to break. Durable materials and ergonomic design.
Adjustable motion sensitivity for different tasks. Reliable for gaming, with customizable weights. Long-lasting performance even after years of use. Excellent for first-person gaming.
cont.entity_b: Transmitter distance can affect performance. Interference issues can occur with wireless networks. Lag can occur during high system activity. Power-saving function may interrupt usage.

cont.entity_a: Logitech control panel lacks OS X support.
cont.entity_b: Receiver plugs easily into USB port. Compact mini receiver reduces clutter.

cont.entity_a: Some find it expensive unless used for gaming.
cont.entity_b: Good value for an inexpensive wireless mouse.

cont.entity_a: Weight cartridge could be more secure. Scroll wheel issues after extended use. Some users experience erratic behavior and freezing.

cont.entity_b: Excellent battery life with power-saving features. Does not consume batteries quickly. Battery life indicator provides timely alerts.
Volume control on the mouse is convenient. Onboard volume controls useful for gaming.
